title: Client error after re-install
body: I have re-installed the game and this still popped up, is it something wrong with my hardrive or is it something else?

replies.body: Hmmmmm when you reinstalled League there might have been a few corrupted files leftover. I'd suggest grabbing the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and making sure to run it with the options **reinstall and clean uninstall** turned on to make sure all files are removed and properly reinstalled. Hit me back up afterwards and let me know how it went.
I ran it and it still popped up, it also pops up after i push launch if that makes any difference.
